overview: Some of the newbies are already starting to arrive on campus. Lots of eye candy, although we haven’t been getting out much, spending a lot of this summer in our air conditioned basement getting drunk, lifting weights and fucking each others brains out. Morgan, a freshman, was out for a jog when some of the boys invited him over for a drink. He wasn’t in the mood for getting drunk, so when he wasn’t looking we spiked it with a little something extra. This slut couldn’t get enough of our dicks. Something tells me he will be back for more. Sean got a little too tipsy last weekend, and ended up on the wrong side of a gangbang.
title: Hot Mess
